attributes.action: To Include one parent family who qualify for Tax Credits on low income to receive Cold weather Payments and not be discriminated just because their children are not disabled.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I dont understand why mothers who are single out working and receiving a top up of tax credit are not entitled to 'cold weather payment' while scrimping to make ends meet, but are told unless you have a disabled child, you do not qualify, Why ? So only disabled Children feel the cold, we are all human !!! The government encourages us to go out and work, but receive no benefits to help bring up the children we are supporting, all thats given are the tax credits, this is ridiculous and has made single mums think of giving up work.
